description:
City Limits is a relaxing tile-based puzzle game where you build cities on a desolate island. Place tiles strategically to create a cascading spread of new structures. Cover the island as efficiently as you can before the land becomes unusable. There is no lose state. Just chill and build.

Features
- Relaxing gameplay
- Several game modes to mix and match
- 10 Chill songs to build to
- Save and quit any run

What City Limits Is and is Not
- City Limits is a chill and relaxing experience. It is best played with headphones. It is deeper than it seems.
- City Limits is not a super long game. It's not a traditional city builder.
name: City Limits
intro: A relaxing tile-based puzzle game where you build cities on a desolate island.
